data.title: Lionel Messi signs $20 million deal to promote crypto fan token firm Socios
data.description: Messi becomes the latest global sports personality to enter the crypto world following NFL quarterback Tom Brady and NBA star LeBron James and the deal is part of a growing wave of tie-ups between crypto firms and soccer.
data.source: Business Today | Latest Stock Market And Economy News India

data.author: Shweta Sengar
data.title: Here's Why People Are Outraged Over Granting Bail To Sulli Deals & Bulli Bai Accused
data.description: A Delhi court, on Tuesday, granted bail to Sulli Deals and Bulli Bai app creators, who targeted Muslim women and "auctioned" them online, on "humanitarian grounds."

data.title: Dyson launches its first-ever headphones with a built-in air purifier
data.description: Dyson has launched its first-ever headphones in the form of a wearable air purifier and has named it Dyson Zone. Here is what the impressive collaboration of the two functionalities promises to offer.

data.author: Aishwarya Dharni
data.title: Amid Fuel Hike, Nitin Gadkari Heads To Parliament In Hydrogen Car Priced At Rs 37 Lakh
data.description: Union Transport Minister Nitin Gadkari today rolled into the Parliament in a green hydrogen. The car is the first of its kind in India.

data.author: Divyanshi Sharma
data.title: Chris Rock's Comedy Tour Ticket Price And Sales Shoot Up Post Oscars 2022 Chaos Involving Will Smith
data.description: An online ticketing market place confirmed that Chris Rock's upcoming stand-up show is witnessing a rise in its ticket price and sales after the entire Oscars 2022 fiasco involving Will Smith.

data.title: Cabinet approves amendment in Mega Power Policy for power projects
data.description: "The increased liquidity will boost the overall growth of the country and also ensure the revival of various stressed power assets," the Union Cabinet said in a statement.

data.author: Aishwarya Dharni
data.title: Battle Of Pollilur Painting Up For Auction At Sotheby's, Bid Starts At Rs 3.68 Crore
data.description: A painting capturing the legendary victory in battle of Indian rulers over British East India Company troops in 1780 is up for auction in London, reported BBC.

data.title: Sukhoi aircraft suffers tyre burst at Pune airport, leads to runway blockage
data.description: The Pune international airport is a civil enclave operating from the Indian Air Force station of Lohegaon, which is used to train IAF pilots.
data.source: Business Today | Latest Stock Market And Economy News India

data.title: Imran Khan loses majority after key ally sides with Oppn ahead of no-trust vote
data.description: Prime Minister Khan needs 172 votes in the lower house of 342 to foil the Opposition's bid to topple him.
data.source: Business Today | Latest Stock Market And Economy News India

data.title: BJP protesters vandalise property outside Kejriwal's house
data.description: Deputy Chief Minister Manish Sisodia lashed out at the Bhartiya Janata Party, alleging it was a ''conspiracy'' to kill Kejriwal as the saffron party is unable to defeat the Aam Aadmi Party in elections.
data.source: Business Today | Latest Stock Market And Economy News India

data.author: Anuj Tiwari
data.title: Bank Holidays In April 2022: Here Is The Full List Of Bank Holidays
data.description: With the current financial year (2021-22) ending on March 31 and the new financial year (2022-23) beginning tomorrow (April 1), all bank customers should be aware of the bank holidays in April 2022 so they can plan their bank visits accordingly.

data.title: Samsung Galaxy S22 and S22+ review in 5 points: Are these Android flagship phones worth buying?
data.description: Samsung had a completely different approach towards the S series this year. The S22 Ultra is a combination of the S and Note line-ups, but the Galaxy S22 and S22+ truly justify their names.

data.author: Vanya Gautam
data.title: India’s Biggest Cookie Manufacturer Britannia Plans To Raise Prices By Up To 7% This Year
data.description: After FMCG giants Nestle, HUL, Parle and Dabur, India’s biggest cookie manufacturer Britannia is the next to announce plans to hike prices as much as 7% this year amidst soaring inflation.

data.title: Xiaomi is not launching a tablet on April 1 but they should soon
data.description: Xiaomi is not launching a tablet on April 1 but the company should consider it, given the reaction to its recent announcement.

data.title: ‘Midnight runner' Pradeep Mehra receives Rs 2.5 lakh cheque from Shoppers Stop
data.description: The development was confimed by journalist and filmmaker Vinod Kapri in a tweet.

data.author: Vanya Gautam
data.title: 30 stocks That Have Crashed Up To 78% Since Pandemic Began
data.description: Amidst the stock market rollercoaster, since the pandemic began two years ago, while some stocks have made investors happy with multi-bagger returns, there have been some stocks that have bled red and given negative returns to investors.

data.author: Aishwarya Dharni
data.title: Fish Served On A Plate Opens Mouth And Grabs Chopstick In Bone-chilling Viral Video
data.description: As soon as the person eating the dish pokes the fish with a chopstick, the fish opens its mouth and grabs the end of the stick. You can see tiny sharp teeth in the fish's mouth, and the whole experience feels very creepy.

data.author: Shweta Sengar
data.title: More Women In Business: Women-led MSMEs In India Rise 75% To 8.59 Lakh Units In FY22
data.description: The number of women leading small businesses in India has seen a massive surge in the last few years.According to government data, the number of women-led micro, small and medium enterprises in India has increased substantially by over 75 per cent in FY22 to 8.59 lakh units, against 4.9 lakh units in the previous fiscal.

data.title: Will not resign, ready to face no-trust vote: Pak PM Imran Khan
data.description: In a live-address to the nation, 69-year-old Khan said he will return stronger no matter what the result of no-trust vote would be.
data.source: Business Today | Latest Stock Market And Economy News India

data.title: Govt directs telcos to withdraw COVID pre-call announcements, caller tunes
data.description: In a circular dated March 29, DoT referred to the instructions that were issued for implementation of corona pre-call announcements and caller tunes to the operators.

data.title: Apple rolls out fix for iPhone battery drain problem, download iOS 15.4.1 right away
data.description: The iOS 15.4.1 brings fixes for some accessibility bugs and enhances the security of the iPhone, besides ironing out bugs that led to the battery drain problem.

data.title: Share Market LIVE: Sensex gains over 200 pts, Nifty above 17,500; NTPC jumps 4%
data.description: The Indian equity market is likely to open in the red today as SGX Nifty was trading 75 points lower at 17,470.80.

data.title: Sylvester Stallone Pays Emotional Tribute To Bruce Willis After His Retirement Announcement
data.description: Sharing a couple of old pictures, Sylvester Stallone wrote how he and Bruce Willis 'go back a long way'. Most pictures shared are from the Expendables era.

data.title: Ind-Ra upgrades Vedanta's long-term issuer rating to 'AA' with stable outlook
data.description: AA-rated instruments are considered to have a high degree of safety regarding timely servicing of financial obligations.

data.title: Horrifying Video Shows Seagull Pulling Live Rabbit Out Of Its Hole And Swallowing It Whole
data.description: A gruesome video is going viral showing a seagull pulling a wild rabbit out of a hole and swallowing it whole.
